text: Shenzhen & Hong Kong Bi‐City Biennale of Urbanism & Architecture is an international event that takes place every 2 years in Hong Kong, China. A "biennale" is an event that happens every 2 years. In 2005, the Chinese government decided to dedicate the biennale to Chinese architecture and urban planning to promote city of Hong Kong and the area of Shenzhen. == Other websites == * Shenzhen & Hong Kong Bi‐City Biennale of Urbanism & Architecture Category:Events in Asia Category:Hong Kong culture Category:2005 establishments in Asia Category:Urban planning exhibitions
title: Shenzhen & Hong Kong Bi‐City Biennale of Urbanism & Architecture
